data.name: MRV
data.description:
The project claims to develop solutions for Masternode technology - It is claimed that MRV was designed to make the setup process for a Masternode as easy as possible with a Masternode Controller Feature, the user simply needs to enter the information, when prompted by the wallet, and the wallet will handle the rest.  It is further claimed that the full guide on how to use the Masternode Controller function can be found on the MRV Github.
